law.text: The secretary shall cause to be printed for distribution to the public the text of this chapter, the secretary's regulations and general rules, his annual report to the Governor, and any other material he deems relevant and suitable, and shall furnish the same to any person upon application therefor.
law.history: Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4748g-4.
